posts.text: Every week, I hear from Delawareans whose health insurance bills have skyrocketed—up hundreds or thousands of dollars per month. Families are already suffering under Trump’s economy, and these price hikes are unacceptable. I won’t stop fighting until we have real solutions that bring costs down.
